name: frustration
flavor_text: This full-power attack grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102.  Power bottoms out at 1.
effect_text_simple: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.
